15211.content:
Jennifer was enjoying the movie far more than she expected to. The plot was captivating, the characters were compelling, and the colors were so... so... pretty. She was so mesmerized by the film that she didn’t realize that her hand had stopped bringing popcorn to her mouth, but instead stayed pressed against her lips as she sucked her thumb.
She was suddenly broken out of her pleasant trance by a sudden jolt. She rubbed her forehead in sudden confusion and then wiped her thumb off when she felt it wet with what she failed to realize was her own drool. After which she tried to get back into the movie. But before she could reach the same level of hypnotic euphoria she felt another sharp nudge to her chair. The second time she realized that someone was kicking her seat. Her first thought was to just let it slide, it was probably nothing more than a hyperactive child, and she knew her fair share about those. 155333.title: More stories to tell

1553331.content:
As Ben looked lazily at the classroom, he wondered how long this would take. His sister Jess was playing on her phone, which had a full charge unlike his. Jess was just one year younger than him, but she was an early bloomer. Like him she had brown hair and hazel eyes, but she wore it long where his was short. After lazily looking at the clock his eyes aligned on his English teacher and his parents. Mrs. Tara was his teachers name (for some reason his high school had an all female staff) and she was always very demure and scholarly. The fact that she had long blonde hair and a body more fitting a porn star than a teacher did nothing to diminish the fact she was a great teacher. His mother Kelly was excitedly speaking, and everything about her screamed energetic. She frequently exercised and was a fit woman who died her hair blue for reasons Ben would never understand. His father meanwhile was a man of few words, much like Ben in personality and appearance.

Unbeknownst to anyone, a recent construction had inadvertently created a symbol of Eileithyia, the greek goddess of children and childbirth. Not just any symbol mind you, a focus for a curse to return adults to the time of innocence. In laymans terms, a building company had, through pure cosmic chance, made a city sized symbol that would mentally regress all adults it targeted back to infancy. And Ben's high school was that target, and would also change furniture accordingly.

From the perspective of Ben and Jess it was shocking. One moment there mother was talking to Mrs. Tara and the next the two were wearing diapers and playing patty cake while there father lay on his back in a cloth diaper babbling like a newborn. This shocked both teenagers into speechlessness, and the sounds of adults childishly talking or wailing like children echoed through the hall, proving it wasn't just there parents and teacher who regressed.

In the gym the PE teacher crawled around, her brown hair cut short while a lesbian couple snuggled together, all wearing diapers. In the front room the principal wore just a dirty diaper, sobbing her green eyes out and having her red hair in pig tails, her huge breasts on display.

Miss Miran, the art teacher, waddled by covered in paint as smearing a pink trail on the lockers as she passed them. Someones mother wandered out of the women’s restroom wearing nothing but a sagging messy diaper with a confused expression as if he couldn’t remember why she went into that room in the first place. A girl was trying to comfort her wailing diapered father as she tried to make sense of any of this herself. And a few other parent and faculty babies were crawling around here and there.

What does Ben do?
15533312.title: ben tries to find help

155333122.content:
Ben was in full panic mode at this point, and he ran around the school. Everywhere he went he saw the parents and faculty in just diapers, none of them possibly able to help. Eventually he came into the front room and saw his friend Justin comforting his mother Principle Bella, or rather little Laura. She was in a fresh diaper and was blubbering about having to be changed by her son. He stroked her back and said, "Its ok mom." She shook her head, pigtails flailing and said, "No! Me big giwl. No sposta be in diapies." She cried harder and Justin hugged her and said, "I'll take care of you for as long as you need." He noticed Ben and said, "Now mom, go play. I have to talk to a friend." He patted her diaper butt, and she crawled away. Soon she started to play with a toy, and all her worries melted away.

Justin walked up to Ben and said causually, "Good thing I babysit." Ben was speechless at his casual acceptance of things and stammered a bit. Justin then said, "Lemme guess, you saw all the adults get turned into diaper filling rugrats and ran around like a chicken with its head cut off and blundered upon me by accident." Ben mutely nodded and Justin then said, "Well I've been here taking care of my mom. Do you have a plan on what to do next?" Ben then admitted, "I honestly didn't think any farther than get help."

Justin nodded, knowing his friend well, and then said, "Well I think we should find Molly. She knows all about weird stuff. She probably has an idea as to what the heck happened and hopefully how to fix it." Ben nodded, Molly was a goth chick who was a good friend of both of them. She was here with the lesbian couple that had adopted her, and last he heard she was in the gym because she was failing that class. So the boys agreed on that plan, and Justin said to Laura "Ok mom, I am gonna go away. Please stay here." His mom looked up at him with innocence in her eyes and babbled, "Otay."

-------

Was Molly in the gym taunting her gym teacher or was she in the library trying to figure out where she read about something like this before.
